patthana17.13:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.13:0.3_0: Next there are satisfaction of the skillful.
patthana17.13:1.1_0: Unskillfulness doesn’t give rise to the principle. Not understanding the causes and conditions for the reason.
patthana17.13:2.1_0: There are no answering for an indeterminate mind, not a cause or reason.
patthana17.13:3.1_0: Unskillful thoughts doesn’t give rise to the skillful.
